entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Wind south 20 km/h except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near Haro Strait overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
